title: When will the Apple iPad be foldable? - Quora

response.answer_text: Apple has had foldable iPhone/iPad working in their labs since before 2014 (the first approved patent) so they have had it for years, they don't produce any because unlike Samsung and Huawei they know that it has too many limitations and will not meet the expectations of their customers who would expect to be able to actually fold the screen without it breaking.

They will make a foldable if that is something that they think will better the experience of an iPad/iPhone. If they see it as not having much bennifits and many possible negatives then no. It gets put on the scrapped projects pile. They have been working on one since around 2012 (same as Samsung) just in the labs.
